title: QUIZ: Do you know your Premier League club's record signing?
description: Do you know your Premier League club's record signing? Take our quiz and find out...
content: With January transfer activity in full flow, teams up and down the country are raiding the market in an attempt to boost their fortunes come May.Premier League clubs have splashed £158m on signings during the window so far, with two clubs having broken their transfer records already.Take our quiz to test your knowledge of each club's most expensive all-time signing...Transfer data courtesy of Sky Sports News with all fees including add ons
